message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe has immense potential value. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you that it's worth at least $1000000 to me. I'm confident it will be even more valuable to the right person. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly special.  Please let me know your decision.
